menu.name: Espresso
menu.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.description: An espresso-based coffee made with equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

menu.name: Latte
menu.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of milk foam.

menu.name: American Coffee
menu.description: A simple, brewed coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water, resulting in a mild, smooth flavor.

menu.name: Mocha
menu.description: A chocolate-flavored espresso drink made with espresso, hot milk, and cocoa, often topped with whipped cream.

menu.name: Caramel Macchiato
menu.description: An espresso-based coffee made with vanilla syrup, steamed milk, and caramel drizzle.
